caption: Table 3: Sample quality evaluation on CIFAR-10. FID (↓), IS (↑), and BPD (↓).
description: This table compares the performance of DSM and LCSS on CIFAR-10 using four different diffusion models.  FID (Fréchet Inception Distance), IS (Inception Score), and BPD (bits per dimension) are used to evaluate the quality of generated images. Lower FID and BPD scores and higher IS scores indicate better image quality.
